expt_aim: How meanings of written words are perceived.
sent2: I really enjoy going sailing with my father.
I really don't like eating out at upscale places..
All of the students were tired.
The player was either skillful or hardworking.
Three of the shirts were striped.
The cookies were sometimes but not always chocolate.
He thought the weekend was good but not excellent.
sent1: I really enjoy walking in the woods alone.
Some but not all of the students were tired.
The player was skillful or hardworking.
Two of the shirts were striped.
He thought the weekend was good.
